# Introduction {.unnumbered}

This {{< sficon wip color=red >}} WIP {{< sficon wip color=red >}} Quarto 'book' is a collection of (mostly R) tips and tricks relevant to data professionals with the City and County of San Francisco. 

Comments, questions, or suggestions? [Create an issue here.](https://github.com/SFOEWD/SF-Data-Tips-and-Tricks/issues)

Edits, additions, or corrections? Open a pull request.

To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.
